Package rubank

Class AccountDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • rubank.AccountDatabase
  • public class AccountDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    The AccountDatabase class represents a database of accounts. It is responsible for storing and managing accounts. It also provides methods for adding, removing, and retrieving accounts from the database. The database is implemented as an array of accounts.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      private Archive archive

      private int size  

    • Constructor Summary

      AccountDatabase()
      Constructs an empty account database with a default capacity.
